thread.title: UPDATE 1-Ericsson Q3 op profit lags forecasts as China sales slow
thread.title_full: UPDATE 1-Ericsson Q3 op profit lags forecasts as China sales slow | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: UPDATE 1-Ericsson Q3 op profit lags forecasts as China sales slow
text:
* Ericsson Q3 op profit 5.1 bln SEK vs avg f'cast 5.4 bln in Reuters poll
* Q3 like-for-like sales drop 9 pct, hit by networks unit (Adds detail)
STOCKHOLM Oct 23 (Reuters) - Swedish mobile telecom equipment maker Ericsson said sales in China fell while sales in North America were stable as it posted third-quarter revenue and profits below market expectations on Friday.
Like-for-like sales at Ericsson, the world's top mobile gear maker, dropped 9 percent in the third quarter, hit by its key networks unit as rollouts of high-speed 4G networks in China slowed.
"We also saw a somewhat slower pace of mobile broadband investments in markets such as Russia, Brazil and parts of the Middle East which had a weak macro development" Ericsson said in a statement.
While revenue was stable for Ericsson's mobile broadband business in North America, its biggest market, it remained lower than at the peaks a year ago.
Operating profit was 5.1 billion Swedish crowns ($604 million) compared to 3.9 billion in the year-ago quarter and below a mean forecast of 5.4 billion crowns in a Reuters poll of analysts.
Sales at Ericsson, the world number one mobile network equipment maker, were 59.2 billion crowns, below a forecast of 60.9 billion. The gross margin was 33.9 percent against a mean forecast of 34.9 percent.
Link to report: ($1 = 8.4446 Swedish crowns) (Reporting by Sven Nordenstam and Olof Swahnberg; Additional reporting by Eric Auchard in Frankfurt; Editing by Alistair Scrutton)
